name: GitHub
description: GitHub API - manage repositories, issues, pull requests, and more

tools.name: list_repositories
tools.description: List repositories for a user or org

tools.name: get_pull_request
tools.description: Get a pull request by number

tools.name: list_pull_requests
tools.description: List pull requests in a repository

tools.name: get_file_contents
tools.description: Get contents of a file in a repository

tools.name: search_issues
tools.description: Search for issues and pull requests

auth.instructions: Create a personal access token at https://github.com/settings/tokens
